body_html: Had the same issue as you yesterday. In tf_core_framework.cmake they are trying to build the *pb.h from the *.proto files. I guess they forgot to check, if the protocol buffer compiler is installed. Maybe it will help, if you install in manually https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/downloads. Please try and let me know

body: Had the same issue as you yesterday. In tf_core_framework.cmake they are trying to build the *pb.h from the *.proto files. I guess they forgot to check, if the protocol buffer compiler is installed. Maybe it will help, if you install in manually https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/downloads.
